title: MPs want answers on 'exaggerated' Villa-Maccabi match intelligence
description: Ministers ask West Midlands Police for more details on Israeli fans' ban at the match on 6 November.
content:
MPs have demanded that police give a fuller account of allegedly exaggerated intelligence that led to a decision to ban to Israeli fans from their club's match against Aston Villa.
A report in the Sunday Times (ST) claimed West Midlands Police (WMP) ... [1884 chars]

title: Homicide probe as man, 82, remains missing
description: Police believe a body found at a farm has links to a missing man who is also thought to have died.
content:
Police have launched a homicide investigation after the body of a 52-year-old man was found at a farm near Newark.
Nottinghamshire Police were called to an outbuilding off the A1133 in Langford shortly after 10:15 GMT on Saturday.

title: Scottish and UK governments hold 'constructive' Mossmorran talks
description: Ministers from both administrations met in Fife, having initially organised separate summits.
content:
The Scottish and UK governments have held "constructive" talks on how best to support the workers at the Mossmorran chemical plant in Fife.
The ethylene manufacturing facility is to close in February, impacting more than 400 workers and contractors.

title: Mum's heartbreaking tribute to boy, 8, who died suddenly after breaking arm
description: Devastated Ciara Breen rushed her boy to hospital after he became unwell - she says he was adored by his brothers and sisters, Tyler, Oliver, Olivia and Amelia
content:
